Predictive Model Performance - Algorithm: Logistic Regression with Random Forest validation - Accuracy: 78.5% - Precision: 0.82 - Recall: 0.75 4. Recommended Retention Strategies - Targeted retention offers for month-to-month customers - Proactive customer support for high-complaint segments - Personalized service upgrade recommendations Visualizations and detailed statistical analysis attached in supplementary document.

Recommended Mitigation Strategies - Develop targeted retention offers for high-risk segments - Implement proactive service quality monitoring - Create personalized communication and loyalty programs - Offer contract flexibility with performance guarantees Confidence Level: 87% based on statistical modeling and historical trend analysis.
